name: Playtime TD
description:
Childhood was a simpler time. Now you can relive those days of playing with your toys in Playtime TD, a small VR experience with a touch of horror. If you place your toys strategically, they may be able to defend your King from the evil office-supplies.

Credits:

Daniel Redzepovic - Programmer
Oskar Nordin - Programmer
Carl Hagelin - Programmer
Medina Ljufi - 3D Artist
Damir Pejinovic - 3D Artist
Annika R-Burgwall - 3D Artist (Artstation)
